metadata.title: USN-3782-1 -- Liblouis vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Henri Salo discovered that Liblouis incorrectly handled certain files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2018-12085)  It was discovered that Liblouis incorrectly handled certain files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. This issue only affected Ubuntu 18.04 LTS. (CVE-2018-17294)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3782-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  liblouis9 - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.4 liblouis-bin - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.4 python-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.4 liblouis-dev - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.4 python3-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.4 liblouis-data - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.4 No subscription required
